class CamelPlugin

Created by IntelliJ IDEA. User: tbarker Date: 7/3/11 Time: 9:05 PM Creates extensions to a job script to do camel routing

getCamelService

static java.lang.Object getCamelService(groovy.lang.Script self, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Class type)
best effort to retrieve a service of a certain type from the property services. The services property is a mixed in property,see class level javadoc for details
Parameters:
name - name of the service
type - type of the service to retrieve
Returns:
the service if it exists, otherwise null

getServiceAndSetProperty

static java.lang.Object getServiceAndSetProperty(groovy.lang.Script self, java.lang.String propertyName, java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.Class type, groovy.lang.Closure getDefault)
retrieves a service by name and type from services. If it is not in services the getDefault function is called to retrieve the default object. If getDefault returns null then an java.lang.IllegalArgumentException is thrown. The property is set to whatever value is found
Parameters:
propertyName - name of the property, it must exist or else a \$groovy.lang.MissingPropertyException is thrown
serviceName - the name of the service in services
type - type of the service
getDefault - closure to call to retrieve the default, must not return null
Returns:
the value that we are looking for

runRoute

static java.lang.Object runRoute(groovy.lang.Script self, java.lang.String route, java.lang.Object body = ObjectUtils.NULL, java.util.Map headers = [:])
Calls a route and gets the result
Parameters:
route - the route to call
body - the body, default to null
headers - the headers as a map, defaults to an empty map
Returns:
he result
